translated_text:
The world
Monday, February 21, 2022
17:43
The world
Medvedev asks Putin to "save 800,000 Russian citizens in Donbas"
Comment
Print out
Members of the Security Council of the Russian Federation advocated recognition of the LDNR. Photo: TASS
Former president and current head of the Security Council of Russia
Dmitry Medvedev
stated that "800,000 Russian citizens" live in the Donetsk and Luhansk regions of Ukraine.
He said this before the President of the Russian Federation
Vladimir Putin
at a meeting of the Security Council of the Russian Federation.
"These are our people. Not only people who speak Russian. These are citizens of our country," he said.
Medvedev said that the US rescues Americans if they are captured.
"If the situation develops in this way, and there are no signs of improvement, then the only way out is to recognize the subjectivity of these territories. This is within the competence of the country's president," he added.
The head of the State Duma
V'yacheslav Volodin
said that it is necessary to save "citizens of Russia, because Kyiv is sabotaging commitments".

In Russia, there was a hysterical reaction to Zelenskyi's statement about "nuclear state Ukraine"
Director of the Foreign Intelligence Service of the Russian Federation
Sergey Naryshkin
advocated "joining the DPR and LPR to the Russian Federation". Putin replied to him that this is not being discussed now.
The president of the aggressor country of the Russian Federation, Vladimir Putin, said that
today will make a decision regarding the "recognition of independence" of the so-called "LDNR"
- Russian-occupied regions of Donetsk and Luhansk regions.

translated_title: RosZMI writes that the TCG will not meet before March - 24 Kanal
translated_text:
RosZMI writes that the TCG will not meet before March
February 21, 2022,
14:56
Read the news in Russian
Russian mass media write that the TCG will not meet before March / Channel 24
Despite the escalation in Donbas, Russia continues to ignore the meeting of the Trilateral Contact Group. Moreover, the Russian mass media are convinced that the group will not meet before March.
Source:
Interfax
Why the TCG will not meet
In Russia, they cynically say that there are no prerequisites for a meeting. They said that Kyiv should first talk to the militants.
It is important
People are in bomb shelters, and Vrubivka and Shchastya are under fire again: a shell hit a gas station
The tripartite contact group regarding Donbas will not meet before March. There are no prerequisites for this - Kyiv is not ready for a dialogue with Donetsk and Luhansk,
- the message says.
Note that Kyiv will not conduct official negotiations with the Kremlin's puppets, as it does not recognize their occupation of the territories of Ukraine.
In addition, in Russia they say that the meeting of the political advisers of the "Normandy four" will not take place before March either.
"A meeting of political advisers is possible based on the results of the contact group after it has worked and there will be something to discuss," the Russian publication noted.
Russia ignores the TCG meeting
The situation in Donbas escalated on February 17. Since that day, Russian mercenaries have been intensively shelling residential areas and the infrastructure of settlements. Because of this, the Ukrainian delegation at the TCG demanded to hold a meeting. It was scheduled for 18:00 on February 18. However,
the Russian side ignored the agreements
and the meeting did not take place.
After that, the TCG was convened on February 19. However, Russia did not join the meeting this time either. Ukraine called such actions of the aggressor state "
with a conscious intention to inflame the situation".
Macron agreed on the meeting regarding Donbass
On February 20, French President Emmanuel Macron had a telephone conversation with the head of the Kremlin, Vladimir Putin. According to its results, Paris declared that the parties
it was possible to agree on the convening of the TCG working group.
The meeting was supposed to take place on February 20, but it never happened.
For the topic, watch the video about the violent mobilization of the population in Donbas:

translated_title: Russia hysterically reacted to Zelenskyi's words about nuclear weapons News on Gazeta.ua
translated_text:
The world
Monday, February 21, 2022
17:05
The world
In Russia, there was a hysterical reaction to Zelenskyi's statement about "nuclear state Ukraine"
Comment
Print out
Putin informed Shoigu about the threat of Ukraine returning to nuclear status. Photo: Reuters
Minister of Defense of Russia
Serhiy Shoigu
believes that the president's statement
Volodymyr Zelenskyi
about the desire to return Ukraine to the status of a "very dangerous" nuclear state.
He said this at a meeting of the Security Council in Russia regarding the situation in Donbas on February 21, reports
Gazeta.ua
.
According to Shoigu, Ukraine can get nuclear weapons allegedly from Germany. And the carriers and weapons available in Ukraine "will be fine," claims the Russian.
READ ALSO:
Putin threatens nuclear weapons
Shoigu believes that the Ukrainian state has greater capabilities in the matter of nuclear weapons than Iran and North Korea.
"This is very dangerous for several reasons. During the long years of Soviet power and being part of the Soviet Union, opportunities were created there to create such weapons and their carriers. If we remember that nuclear weapons are located on the territory of Germany, then here (in Ukraine. -
Gazeta.ua
) it can appear on those carriers that are already available today. That is, there is equipment, technology, specialists. There are opportunities much greater than in Iran and North Korea..." Shoigu said.
The Russian official's speech was also full of propaganda narratives. Shoigu warned about "nationalist battalions throughout Ukraine, which have radical views and appeals." They allegedly control the situation in a number of regions of Ukraine, in particular in Luhansk region and Donetsk region.
On February 19, at the Munich Security Conference, Volodymyr Zelensky announced his intention to convene a meeting of the guarantors of the Budapest Memorandum of 1994. According to him, if the negotiations do not take place, Ukraine will have "full right to believe" that the document does not work and all decisions enshrined in it, including those regarding the abandonment of nuclear weapons, "have been called into question."
The meeting of the Security Council of the Russian Federation, which was held by the president of the aggressor country
Vladimir Putin
and which is broadcast "online" by the Russian mass media, took place at 5 p.m. ago. About this
the watch on Sergei Shoigu's hand shows
. The clock time - 12:47 - got into the frame. The official online broadcast of the meeting began around 5:00 p.m. Moscow time, around 4:00 p.m. Kyiv time.
Putin called the purpose of the meeting "to determine the steps regarding Donbas" and declared that Ukraine
is preparing a "punitive operation"
.

translated_title: Russia recognized the LPR and DPR as illegal News on Gazeta.ua
translated_text:
Donbass
Monday, February 21, 2022
21:40
Donbass
Special topic:
The enemy near the Ukrainian border
Putin recognized ORDLO and openly threatened Ukraine
Comment
Print out
Putin recognized the LDNR. Photo: Reuters
The aggressor country, the Russian Federation, recognized the occupied territories of Donetsk and Luhansk regions as "independent republics".
This is what the Russian president said
Vladimir Putin
said during an address to the nation on February 21. He also presented his own version of history for the past 105 years and repeated the thesis of Russian propaganda that modern Ukraine "was created by Bolshevik Russia", reports
Gazeta.ua
.
"Stalin annexed lands that previously belonged to Poland, Romania and Hungary to the USSR. Khrushchev for some reason took Crimea from Russia and gave it to the Ukrainians. Lenin and his associates created modern Ukraine by withdrawing territories from Russia. At the same time, the Bolsheviks simply pushed the Donbas into Ukraine, satisfying the wishes of the nationalists in order to stay in power at any cost," Putin said.
He also made a number of threats, including declaring that he would teach Ukrainians "true decommunization."
"Do you want decommunization? We are quite satisfied with that. We are ready to show what real decommunization means for Ukraine. Are you renouncing your own past, the so-called colonial heritage of the Russian Empire? Well, then be consistent," Putin added, promising to punish "those who burned people in the Trade Union Building in Odessa."
READ ALSO:
The Kremlin "burned out" on another fake - the "online" of Putin's Security Council took place 5 hours ago
At the end of the speech, which lasted more than an hour, Putin called on the Russian parliament to support the conclusion of agreements on cooperation with the DPR and the LPR.
"Ukraine still has Soviet nuclear technologies and means of delivery of such weapons, including aviation. It will be much easier for Ukraine to acquire tactical nuclear weapons than for another state that is conducting such developments. With the appearance of weapons of mass destruction in Ukraine, the situation in the world and for us, for Russia, will change in the most radical way. We cannot fail to react," the Russian President also said.
Deputy of the State Duma
Gennady Zyuganov
said on Monday that after the recognition of L/DNR, Russian troops will be introduced into Donbas.
On February 21, the leaders of the LDNR militants
Leonid Pasichnyk
and
Denis Pushylin
turned to Putin
"to recognize the independence of the republics".
Last week, the State Duma of the Russian Federation appealed to Putin
on the recognition of L/DNR
.

translated_title: "Russian weapons are always present in Donbas": will Moscow dare to officially arm militants - 24 Kanal
translated_text:
"Russian weapons are always present in Donbas": will Moscow dare to officially arm the militants
February 21, 2022,
17:01
Read the news in Russian
"Russian weapons are always present in Donbas": will Moscow dare to officially arm the militants / Getty Images
Russia constantly supplies weapons to its militants in the temporarily occupied territories of Donbas. However, it is not in the interests of Moscow to do this officially.
Why and whether Russia will dare to legally arm its fighters in Donbas - comments on the website 24, military and political commentator Oleksandr Kovalenko said.
Read
"Russia is like a monkey with nuclear weapons": why does the Kremlin officially supply weapons to Donbas
"Officially - not in the interests of Moscow"
The United Russia presidential party spoke in favor of supplying military products to the temporarily occupied territories of Donetsk and Luhansk regions, as well as providing social assistance to people. State Duma Speaker Vyacheslav Volodin wrote in his Telegram channel that "The issue is very serious and responsible. It is about protecting the lives of our citizens and "compatriots".
Oleksandr Kovalenko
said that when it comes to the recognition of these "republics" or the official supply of weapons, it is not primarily in the interests of official Moscow.
In his opinion, Volodin can speak about this, who, like Volodymyr Zhirynovsky, is very often tasked with expressing certain schizophrenic slogans and relaying them to society. First of all, for the domestic consumer.
It is also an attempt to intimidate international partners and Ukraine itself. But, in general, the Kremlin perfectly understands that the recognition of ps
EU republics and official supplies will lead to sanctions. It is also a violation of the Minsk agreements by Russia,
‚Äì
emphasized the specialist.
Official supplies will have consequences, a confident expert / Photo from the expert's Facebook
Kovalenko added that Russian officials demonstrate that "they somehow don't care whether these agreements exist or not, since only Ukraine must adhere to them, and Russia is not a party to the conflict." But it is the Minsk agreements that today are the "lifeline" that does not allow Moscow to "fall face down in the dirt" to the end, namely to drag out this conflict situation in ORDLO and Crimea for as long as possible.
To the topic
Putin's recognition of the militants will mean an attack on the sovereignty of Ukraine, - France
Russia's recognition of militants in the occupied part of Donbas: how Ukraine and the world reacted
The Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Ukraine emphasized that such a document
will have no legal consequences.
NATO Secretary General Jens Stoltenberg said that in this case
Russia will violate international law and the Minsk agreements.
German Chancellor Olaf Scholz:
such a move would be a disaster.
And French President Emmanuel Macron is simple
asked Putin not to fulfill the request of the Duma.

President of the aggressor country of the Russian Federation
Vladimir Putin
declared that today he will make a decision regarding the "recognition of independence" of the so-called "LDNR" - the Russian-occupied districts of Donetsk and Luhansk regions.
He announced this at a meeting of the Security Council of the Russian Federation.
"I heard you. The decision will be made today," he said.
Before that, Putin said that he "does not discuss" the "inclusion of the LDNR" in the Russian Federation. And the members of the Security Council announced the "recognition of the independence" of the territories of Ukraine occupied by Russia.

translated_text:
Everyone understands the consequences of such a step, - Kuleba about Russia's attempts to "legitimize" militants
February 21, 2022,
19:17
Read the news in Russian
Kuleba commented on Russia's attempts to "legitimize" militants / Dmitry Kuleba's Facebook
Dmytro Kuleba commented on the consequences of Russia's possible recognition of militants in Donbas. The minister emphasized that everyone understands the consequences of such a step by the aggressor state.
Source:
Dmytro Kuleba's twitter
The head of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Ukraine, Dmytro Kuleba, noted that now not only Ukraine, but also the whole world is closely monitoring Russia's actions regarding the recognition of militants.
Read also
Recognition of militants in Donbas will bring many, many problems to Russia, a military expert said
Kuleba about Russia's attempts to "legitimize" militants
Everyone understands the consequences of such a move. There are a lot of emotions and impulses right now, but right now everyone needs to keep their cool and focus on de-escalation efforts,
- emphasized the minister.
According to Kuleba, there is no other way.
Possible recognition of militants by Russia: briefly
February 15 State Duma of Russia
turned to Vladimir Putin with a request to "legalize" militants in Donbas.
The Ukrainian Ministry of Foreign Affairs noted that
such a decision of the aggressor state will have no legal consequences.
The international community condemned the Duma's initiative and urged Putin not to take such steps.
On February 21, the leaders of the militants of Donetsk region and Luhansk region
asked Putin to recognize their "independence".
The head of the Kremlin himself convened a meeting of the Security Council, after which he announced that he would make a decision on this on February 21.
By the way, Putin decided on a very serious escalation: watch the video
The text of Dmitry Kuleba's post:
Now, not only Ukraine, but also the whole world is closely following the actions of the Russian Federation regarding the recognition of ORDLO. Everyone understands the consequences of such a step. There are a lot of emotions and impulses right now, but right now everyone needs to keep their cool and focus on de-escalation efforts. There is no other way.

translated_title: Medvedev said about "800,000" Russians in Donbas who "need to be saved" - LB.ua news portal
translated_text:
Main
‚Äî
The world
‚Äî
February 21, 2022, 4:57 p.m
Medvedev stated about "800,000" Russians in Donbas who "need to be saved"
"These are our people. Not only people who speak Russian. These are citizens of our country."
Iryna Lysohor
, head of the "News" department
Facebook
Twitter
LB.ua in Google News
Dmitry Medvedev
Photo: kremlin.ru
The former president and prime minister of Russia, Dmytro Medvedev, who is currently the deputy head of the Security Council, stated that there are "800,000 Russian citizens" living in the Donetsk and Luhansk regions of Ukraine.
He made the corresponding statement at a meeting of the Security Council convened by Russian President Putin.
"These are our people. Not only people who speak Russian. These are citizens of our country," he said.
He drew a parallel with the US rescuing Americans if they were captured.
"If the situation will develop in this way, and there are no signs of improvement, then the only way out is to recognize the subjectivity of these territories. This is within the competence of the country's president," Medvedev added.
The head of the State Duma said the same thing
V'yacheslav Volodin
- that it is necessary to save "citizens of Russia", because "Kyiv is sabotaging commitments". He asked Putin to recognize the "independence" of the illegitimate formations of the "LDNR".
It will be recalled that last week the State Duma voted for an appeal to Putin to recognize the self-proclaimed illegitimate formations of the DPR and LPR as "independent states". The text states that the deputies "consider the recognition" of the "DPR" and "LPR" to be well-founded and morally justified.
Minister of Foreign Affairs Dmytro Kuleba stated that this actually means Russia's withdrawal from the Minsk agreements. The Kremlin said that Putin "took note" of the State Duma's appeal, but agrees that
such recognition contradicts the Minsk agreements
. At the same time, the aggressor country constantly accuses Ukraine of violating "Minsk" and tries to pass off its shelling as the Armed Forces.
Russia previously recognized the "independence" of Abkhazia, a territory captured as a result of the Russian-Georgian war. Russia has not recognized Transnistria as an independent "state", but it has its own consulate there. The Minister of Defense of Ukraine also said that
Russia is preparing to recognize ORDLO
according to the scenario developed in Georgia.
February 22
both chambers of the Russian State Duma will meet
. It was the same in 2008, when the Russian Federation officially sent troops to Georgia. The head of the Duma, Vyacheslav Volodin, confirmed this weekend that
the issue will be considered at the meeting on February 22
ORDLO
The Minister of Defense of Ukraine Oleksiy Reznikov stated that
recognition by the Russian State Duma of the "independence" of the illegitimate formations of the "DPR" and "LPR"
will actually violate the territorial integrity of Ukraine and be a pretext for an invasion.
Iryna Lysohor
, head of the "News" department

translated_title: Putin signed a decree on the recognition of the so-called LPR/DPR
translated_text:
21:51
21.02.2022
Putin signed a decree on the recognition of the so-called LPR/DPR
1 min to read
At a ceremony in the Kremlin, Russian President Vladimir Putin signed a decree recognizing the independence of the so-called Luhansk People's Republic and the Donetsk People's Republic.
The ceremony was broadcast by Russian TV channels.
In addition, Putin signed agreements on friendship and mutual assistance with the leaders of the so-called L/DPR Leonid Pasichnik and Denis Pushylin, who were in the Kremlin.
"I consider it necessary to make a long overdue decision - to immediately recognize the independence and sovereignty of the "Donetsk People's Republic" and the "Luhansk People's Republic," he said during his televised address.
"I ask the Federal Assembly of the Russian Federation to support this decision, and then to ratify the friendship and mutual assistance agreements with both republics," he added.
"And from those who seized and hold the power in Kyiv, we demand an immediate cessation of hostilities. Otherwise, all responsibility for the possible continuation of bloodshed will be fully and completely on the conscience of the regime ruling on the territory of Ukraine," Putin said in a televised address.

translated_title: Donbas: Putin introduces troops into LPR and DPR | News on Gazeta.ua
translated_text:
Donbass
Monday, February 21, 2022
23:52
Donbass
Special topic:
The enemy near the Ukrainian border
Putin is sending troops into occupied Donbas
Comment
President of the Russian Federation
Vladimir Putin
signed a decree on the introduction of Russian troops into occupied Donbas.
The troops are introduced after the recognition of the so-called Donetsk and Luhansk "people's republics". These are supposed to be "peacekeepers", according to Putin's decrees.
Putin's decree on the deployment of troops to Donbas
In connection with the appeal of the leaders of the "republics" Denys Pushylin and Leonid Pasichnyk, the Russian Ministry of Defense is instructed to ensure that the Armed Forces perform "peacekeeping functions" in the occupied territories.
READ ALSO:
"Nazi and terrorist" - social networks react to Putin's statements
By the same decrees, the so-called DPR and LPR are recognized by Russia as "sovereign and independent states". And he is also instructed to establish "diplomatic relations" with them.
Videos of Russian vehicles moving in the direction of Donetsk are already appearing online.
Information about the movement of large echelons of military equipment and servicemen from the center of Donetsk towards the front line with Ukrainian troops was confirmed by eyewitnesses, reports "
Radio Svoboda
".
"On the hundredth unit, they lost count. It was going from Donetsk on the highway between Donetsk and Makiivka, probably in the direction of Yasynuvata. They were getting on the highway from the center of Donetsk," - say the locals.
A column of tanks and armored vehicles passed through the city center around 10:00 p.m. outside Kyiv. The echelons moved along the street. University Street in the northwest direction, to the contact line.
According to eyewitnesses, tanks, armored personnel carriers and people were seen in the convoy. Allegedly, according to them, the movement of equipment continued for an hour.
As the residents of Donetsk told the publication, in the last eight years, they do not recall such a number of troops on the streets of the occupied city.
The aggressor country is the Russian Federation
recognized the occupied territories
Donetsk and Luhansk regions as "independent republics".

translated_text:
Ukraine will continue to pay pensions to residents of the occupied territories, - Danilov
February 21, 2022,
23:53
Read the news in Russian
Danilov says that Ukraine will fulfill all its obligations / "Parlament.ua"
Oleksiy Danilov, Secretary of the National Security and Defense Council, said that Ukraine does not absolve itself of all responsibilities that concern our citizens in the territories seized by Russia. The official emphasized this during a briefing on February 21.
Source:
Channel 24
According to the Secretary of the National Security Council, the authorities of Ukraine are going to fulfill all obligations to the residents of the non-controlled part of Donbas. This is Danilov's answer to the question of whether pensions and social benefits will be paid after Russia recognizes quasi-entities.
See also
Putin ordered troops to be sent to the occupied Donbas - supposedly for peace
In addition, the official noted that the National Security Council switched to a new 24/7 working schedule.
The meeting of the National Security Council has not yet ended
As Danilov emphasized during the briefing, the members of the National Security Council have not finished the urgent meeting yet. All decisions that will be made will be announced additionally.
In addition, the Secretary of the Council noted that the informational aggression against our country continues. Therefore, he asked the mass media and Ukrainians to trust only official sources of information.
What is known about Putin's recognition of pseudo-republics in Donbas
In the evening of February 21, Kyiv time, the Russian dictator announced the recognition of the territories of Donetsk and Luhansk regions captured by Moscow. After that he
signed the relevant orders
in the presence of the leaders of the puppet "republics". All civilized countries of the world reacted decisively to Putin's actions. In the West, they are going to introduce new sanctions against Russia.
Putin was supported only by the unrecognized and Moscow-captured "republics" in Georgia, as well as in Syria, Nicaragua, and Venezuela.
It is currently unknown what restrictions the Russian Federation will expect.

translated_title: Great Britain is preparing to announce sanctions for Russia's recognition of quasi-entities - 24 Kanal
translated_text:
Great Britain is preparing to announce sanctions for Russia's recognition of quasi-entities
February 21, 2022,
23:31
Read the news in Russian
Liz Truss announced the introduction of new sanctions against Russia / Interfax
Representatives of the British government are going to introduce new sanctions against Russian officials and companies due to another violation of Ukraine's sovereignty. The restrictions should be announced on February 22.
Source:
The Guardian
Journalists from The Guardian noted the preparations for the implementation of sanctions, which, according to preliminary data, should not be related to Russia's probable full-scale invasion of Ukraine. Later, British Foreign Secretary Liz Truss officially confirmed the introduction of additional restrictions.
See also
Putin announced the recognition of the "independence" of the Donbas militants
British Prime Minister Boris Johnson also officially condemned Putin's decision to recognize pseudo-republics captured by Russia.
An attack on the sovereignty of Ukraine
According to the head of the British Foreign Ministry, the step of the Kremlin dictator is the end of the Minsk process and a violation of the UN charter.
The decision to recognize quasi-entities is an attack on the sovereignty of Ukraine and its territorial integrity. It signals the end of the Minsk process and the violation of the UN Charter. It testifies to Russia's decision to choose the path of confrontation rather than dialogue,
- said Truss.
What is known about the "legitimization" of militants by Russia
Eight years after the capture by Russian troops and puppets among the local population of Donetsk and Luhansk regions, the Kremlin decided to escalate the conflict.
After the long-term rattling of weapons on the borders with Ukraine, as well as the almost complete encirclement of our state by a military contingent, Moscow announced
recognition of quasi-republics
.
The Verkhovna Rada of Ukraine appealed to international organizations and states of the world
with a request not to recognize the "legitimization" of the occupiers
.

translated_title: Russia's aggression - why the Russian Federation wants to recognize the so-called LDPR | News on Gazeta.ua
translated_text:
Politics
Monday, February 21, 2022
19:37
Politics
"Putin is trying to raise the stakes" - why the Russian Federation wants to recognize the so-called LDNR
Comment
"The Russian Federation has understood that Ukraine, under any government, will not fulfill the Minsk agreements on the terms of the Kremlin," says Oleksiy Holobutskyi. Photo: "Ukrainian Pravda"
President of Russia
Vladimir Putin
because of the recognition of the independence of the occupied regions of Donetsk and Luhansk regions, he is trying to raise the stakes before the conversation with the US president
Joe Biden
. About this
Gazeta.ua
said the political scientist
Oleksiy Holobutskyi
.
"Russia could have recognized these territories for eight years. Our army has become more combat-ready. Now the West has united. The question is why is it necessary now? One of the options is another attempt to raise the stakes before the conversation with Biden. Putin needs to move away from the threat of a full-scale war, because the Russian Federation has understood that Ukraine, under any government, will not fulfill the Minsk agreements on the terms of the Kremlin. There may be an option that Putin wants to create a Union state to repeat the Soviet Union, collect the remnants of the Russian Empire," says Holobutsky.
Putin may raise the stakes to negotiate with Biden and Europe, the political scientist adds.
READ ALSO:
"Putin arranged a problem in order to negotiate" - Garmash on Russia's attempt to recognize the ORDLO
"Moscow can offer an option - there will be no war in exchange for the fact that the West does not impose additional sanctions if the "LDPR" becomes independent. Putin would not hold the Donbas for eight years so that we return there on our terms. This will lead to catastrophic scenarios in Russia itself," says Holobutsky.
All signs point to President Putin and the Russians embarking on a plan to launch a large-scale military invasion of Ukraine, White House adviser Jake Sullivan said. Such statements may be a reaction to Putin's game, says the political scientist.
READ ALSO:
"The Kremlin can resort to provocations" - why did the Russian Federation talk about recognizing ORDLO
"Intelligence gives information to Western leaders that this is possible. If the war starts, then the West was right. If not, Biden has an excellent position that the war has not started, because they shouted loudly about it. Putin does not like such direct things, he likes a hybrid war. And it will be impossible to preserve hybridity now. Therefore, one of Putin's options is to suspend the situation, but in a slightly different configuration. Maybe the independence of these territories will be recognized, but it will arise the question is whether they will join Russia. They understand this in Russia. If you think rationally, they are not beneficial to Putin."
The President of the aggressor country of the Russian Federation, Vladimir Putin, said that today
will make a decision
regarding the "recognition of independence" of the so-called "LDNR" - Russian-occupied districts of Donetsk and Luhansk regions.
On February 21, the leaders of the LDNR militants
Leonid Pasichnyk
and
Denis Pushylin
turned to Putin
"to recognize the independence of the republics".
Last week, the State Duma of the Russian Federation appealed to Putin
on the recognition of "LDNR"
.

translated_title: Under the guise of exercises: Russia introduced amphibious and combat ships to the Sea of ‚Äã‚ÄãAzov - Russia news - 24 Kanal
translated_text:
Under the guise of exercises: Russia introduced amphibious and combat ships to the Sea of Azov
February 21, 2022,
11:53
Russia has brought warships into the waters of the Sea of Azov / Military
Russia introduced warships and missile boats into the territory of the Sea of Azov. The aggressor state again explains this by conducting "training". Earlier there was an attempt to block all of Azov for this.
This was announced by Minister of Defense Oleksiy Reznikov at a joint briefing with Minister of Culture and Information Policy Oleksandr Tkachenko. Reznikov confirmed that the Russians are actively maneuvering near the borders of Ukraine, their concentration is being tracked on the territory of the occupied Crimea.
Relevant
For a possible invasion: Reznikov on Ukraine's reaction to the legitimization of the so-called "republics"
3 large amphibious ships and 5 combat ships entered the Sea of Azov
Ships are moving in the Black and Azov seas. There was an attempt to block even all of Azov, as well as access to our ports in Odesa. But they did not succeed. Now, under the pretext of participating in exercises, 3 large amphibious ships and 5 warships and boats of other classes, including a missile boat, entered the Sea of Azov.
Reznikov said.
The minister also emphasized that the continuation of joint exercises on the territory of Belarus did not come as a surprise to him. After all, troops from distant regions of Russia had been arriving here for several weeks, so it was unlikely that they would be withdrawn.
Pay attention!
As for the sudden military exercises on the territory of Transnistria, the Ministry of Defense says that this is not a surprise either. The Armed Forces are ready to respond to them if necessary.
See photo from the Sea of Azov / Photo from "Military"
Read also
The waters of the Black and Azov seas were included in the list of military risk zones
Russian troops near the border of Ukraine: the latest news
According to
with Maxar company data,
satellite images show that the activity of Russian troops near the northeastern border of Ukraine has increased. They left the training grounds and are closer to the border - in the forests and near them.
Vladimir Putin decided to hold
meeting of the Security Council of Russia on February 21. The topic has not yet been named.
Defense Minister Oleksiy Reznikov did not rule out that the "legitimization" of the "quasi-republics" could be a reason for Russia's invasion. There is talk, in particular, about the introduction of so-called "peacekeepers".
Meanwhile in Donbas
active shelling continues
from the side of the occupiers: they are shelling residential buildings, at the same time blaming the Armed Forces.

translated_text:
20:13
21.02.2022
Putin informed Macron and Scholz that he would sign a decree recognizing the so-called "DPR/LPR" is the Kremlin
1 min to read
Russian President Vladimir Putin held telephone conversations with French President Emmanuel Macron and German Chancellor Olaf Scholz, the Kremlin press service reported on Monday evening.
"Putin informed about the results of the extended meeting of the Security Council of the Russian Federation, which discussed the current situation around Donbas in the context of the State Duma's resolution on the recognition of the Donetsk and Luhansk People's Republics. Today, the leadership of the DPR and LPR received an appeal regarding the recognition of their sovereignty in connection with the military aggression of the Ukrainian authorities, massive shelling of the territory of Donbas, as a result of which the civilian population is suffering," - says messages
"In view of all this, the President of Russia announced that he intends to sign the corresponding decree in the near future," the press service informs.
The President of France and the Federal Chancellor of Germany "expressed their disappointment with this development. At the same time, they indicated their readiness to continue contacts," the message said.

translated_title: Russia's Security Council asks to recognize "L/DNR", Putin will announce the decision today | Den newspaper
translated_text:
February 21, 2022 - 18:34
Tweet
Reuters photo
The Security Council of Russia held an extraordinary meeting chaired by Russian President Vladimir Putin on February 21. During it, all participants expressed their support for the recognition of the "independence" of parts of the Luhansk and Donetsk regions of Ukraine, which are currently controlled by the Moscow-backed LPR and DNR groups.
As conveyed by "
Radio Svoboda
", the head of the State Duma of Russia V'yacheslav Volodin, addressing Putin, called the situation in ORDLO "critical", and the Duma's request for recognition as dictated by "humanitarian considerations". He also pointed to the number of residents of the occupied parts of Donbas who received Russian passports.
"Citizens of our country live there - 1,200,000 people have applied for citizenship... Our actions are aimed at protecting our compatriots. Considering that the situation has not changed for 8 years, and Kyiv is sabotaging all the commitments it has made... Vladimir Volodymyrovych, we ask you to recognize (illegal armed formations - ed.) the "Donetsk" and "Luhansk" republics," Vyacheslav Volodin, head of the State Duma of Russia, said at a meeting of the Security Council, addressing Putin.
Similar positions were expressed by the rest of the officials who spoke at the meeting. At the same time, some Russian officials, such as the Secretary of the Security Council Mykola Patrushev, suggested that Putin also agree to negotiations with US President Joe Biden in order to explain Moscow's position.
"But I am convinced that you will be given a negative answer (to Russia's demands - ed.), they will not agree with you, so the only solution is recognition," he added.
Also, according to reports on the portals of the DPR and LPR militants, these groups also appealed to Putin to recognize their "independence."
At the end of the meeting, Putin said that "the decision will be made today."

translated_title: War with Russia: Poroshenko called for the introduction of personal sanctions News on Gazeta.ua
translated_text:
Politics
Tuesday, February 22, 2022
00:25
Politics
Poroshenko called for the introduction of sanctions against Putin and his closest circle
Comment
Poroshenko spoke about sanctions against Putin. Photo: Ukrainian truth
Petro Poroshenko
called on Western partners of Ukraine to introduce personal sanctions against Putin and his entourage.
"I must emphasize: with today's criminal decision, the Kremlin is pushing the world to the brink of a new world war, although its first addressee is Ukraine. Putin hates our sovereignty so much, our independence "hurts" him so much, he does not want to see our success so much that he is ready for any madness. Otherwise, it cannot be called madness," Poroshenko is convinced, reports
site
party
"Putin chose confrontation and finally destroyed the international system of law and order, which was created after the Cold War period. I strongly condemn Russia's decision to "recognize the independence" of the so-called DPR and LPR," Poroshenko commented.
"By recognizing the puppets of the Kremlin in the occupied Donbas, Moscow legalizes its long-term occupation of this territory of ours. Putin has threatened and continues to threaten the very independence of Ukraine, and for this he is ready for an indefinite confrontation with the collective West", - believes the leader of the "European Solidarity" party.
Poroshenko said that Putin's government is a threat to peace and security, to the region and the world, to Ukraine and its own people. This step finally kills the Minsk agreements and is another step by Moscow to further escalate the situation and continue Russian aggression against Ukraine.
READ ALSO:
"Nazi and terrorist" - social networks react to Putin's statements
"Thanking our partners for their strong support and help, I call on them to immediately introduce sanctions against the President of Russia Vladimir Putin and his entourage, all members of today's meeting of the Security Council of Russia, Russian oligarchs and deputies of both houses of the Russian Parliament. With their criminal decisions, Putin and his accomplices have effectively isolated themselves from the civilized world, and therefore should feel like real "outcasts" in the international community. It is time to tie sanctions and the prospect of their strengthening to the full restoration of sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine. Putin and his entourage must understand that they will never get off the hook," Poroshenko urged.
The fifth president commented that today Putin leaves the democratic world no choice but to restrain Russia's aggressive course. Because today he once again made it clear that his appetites do not end at the borders of Ukraine.
"And we must be united - all Ukrainians, the entire democratic world in confronting this threat. And we will definitely win. Because the truth is with us. Because we are fighting for our native land and our European future," Poroshenko sums up.
President of the Russian Federation Vladimir Putin
signed a decree on the introduction of Russian troops
to occupied Donbas. The troops are introduced after the recognition of the so-called Donetsk and Luhansk "people's republics". It is about alleged "peacekeepers".

translated_title: Resonance in Munich, the transatlantic Biden and Lukashenka's "union determination" - Government Courier - the newspaper of the central authorities of Ukraine online
translated_text:
The escalation of violence in Donbas forces politicians to react more actively. Volodymyr Zelenskyy delivered a resonant speech at the Munich Security Conference. In the capital of Bavaria, Dmytro Kuleba called on the EU to provide Ukraine with a European perspective. Joseph Biden demonstrates that Ukraine is in the zone of his increased attention. Oleksandr Lukashenko donated the remnants of sovereignty to Belarus. The creation of a new alliance was announced in Kyiv. Emmanuel Macron initiated the security summit.
No sooner had the Russian State Duma proposed to Putin to consider the issue of recognizing the independence of the so-called DPR and LPR than a powerful escalation began in Donbas according to the Russian scenario. The Kremlin's pause is unlikely to mislead anyone. The evacuation of the civilian population from ORDLO, which is more reminiscent of deportation, the spread of fake accusations against Ukraine, bellicose statements of Russian politicians ‚Äî all these are predictable components of Russia's activation in Donbas. However, it is indicative that the reaction in the West is significantly different from 2014.
Volodymyr Zelensky became one of the headliners of the Munich Security Conference. The President of Ukraine reprimanded Western countries for unfulfilled promises, called for a decision on Ukraine's prospects for joining NATO, and demanded access to cheap financial resources. Observers called Zelenskyi's speech resonant, but one should not forget that one swallow does not make spring even in the last decade of February. Dmytro Kuleba called on the European Union to give Ukraine a European perspective, Olaf Scholz (after a trip to Kyiv and Moscow) publicly mocked Putin's statements about the genocide in Donbas, and Boris Johnson warned of the possibility of the largest war in Europe since the Second World War.
Although Joseph Biden remains overseas, he demonstrates in every possible way that he keeps the situation around Ukraine in the zone of his own increased attention. The US president made special statements twice last week on the situation around Ukraine, predicting a Russian invasion and promising to introduce unprecedented sanctions against the Kremlin in the event of its aggression. The behavior of President Biden is strikingly different from the actions of Washington during the time of Barack Obama, in whose administration this veteran of American politics was vice president.
Oleksandr Lukashenko effectively said goodbye to the remnants of the sovereignty of Belarus. You can endlessly listen to his stories about "powerful Belarus", which repels Western encroachments, or you can just look at the Russian troops that remained on Belarusian territory after the "Union Resolute" exercise. The fact that Lukashenko the other day emphasized that Russian military bases should be created on the territory of Belarus gives the situation a certain piquancy. It remains to be determined the final goal of keeping Russian "bayonets" at Lukashenka's side: whether it is just pressure on Ukraine, or "facilitation" in holding a referendum on the adoption of a new version of the Constitution, scheduled for February 27.
Eugene MAGDA,
Institute of World Politics
(Ukrynform)

translated_title: The NSDC gathered for an urgent meeting: online broadcast of the briefing - Channel 24
translated_text:
The National Security Council has gathered for an urgent meeting: the main thing is the briefing
February 21, 2022,
23:21
Read the news in Russian
An urgent meeting of the National Security Council was held on February 21 / Office of the President
On Monday, February 21, Volodymyr Zelenskyi convened an emergency meeting of the National Security Council. The main topic was the cynical recognition of the occupiers of Donbas by Russia.
Later, Oleksiy Danilov gave a briefing to journalists, Channel 24 reports. The secretary of the NSDC reported that the NSDC is currently working 24/7. The meeting was not closed. All members of the National Security Council are at their workplaces.
Note
Zelensky discussed with Biden the latest events surrounding Ukraine
Danilov emphasized that the situation near the Ukrainian borders was discussed during the meeting. They also listened to the reports of Prosecutor General Iryna Venediktova and members of the National Security Council.
The Secretary of the National Security Council assured that Ukraine will fulfill all its obligations to the residents of the occupied territories of Donbas.
We clearly understand that the territory of our country is Crimea and all regions that are part of our territory, in accordance with the Constitution,
Danilov emphasized.
Note!
The Constitution says that Ukraine includes: Autonomous Republic of Crimea, Vinnytsia, Volyn, Dnipropetrovsk, Donetsk, Zhytomyr, Zakarpattia, Zaporizhzhya, Ivano-Frankivsk, Kyiv, Kirovohrad, Luhansk, Lviv, Mykolaiv, Odesa, Poltava, Rivne, Sumy, Ternopil, Kharkiv, Kherson, Khmelnytsky, Cherkasy, Chernivtsi, Chernihiv regions, the cities of Kyiv and Sevastopol.
NSDC briefing after the emergency meeting: watch the video
What happened on February 21
The occupiers in Donbas continued to violate the regime of silence. They fired mortars, grenade launchers, machine guns, anti-tank guided missile systems, small arms. During the shelling of Novoluhanskyi
a civilian was killed
.
Enemy shells hit the
thermal power plant
in Luhansk Region. Several settlements remain without power.
Meanwhile, in Moscow, Vladimir Putin convened a meeting of the Security Council. It discussed the issue of recognition of militants from the occupied Donbass. The event turned into a traditional show of propagandists for official Moscow. Speakers practiced the "skill" of spreading fakes about Ukraine.
Subsequently, Putin made an absurd and cynical appeal. The leader of the Kremlin
announced the "recognition" of the independence of the Donbas militants

Chechen professionalism
The leader of Chechnya, Ramzan Kadyrov, appointed his 20-year-old daughter to the post of deputy head of his secretariat. The girl graduated from high school in 2019, but nothing is known about whether she has the higher education necessary to work in the civil service.

State Duma deputy Yevgeny Fedorov suggested transferring the housing of people who died from the coronavirus to refugees from Donbas. According to him, residents of the occupied territories of Donetsk and Luhansk regions can compensate for deaths from COVID-19.

According to the occupiers, there were "Zhygules" on the way of the so-called evacuation buses that were taking people to Russia, and there were allegedly 200 kilograms of TNT.

Brakes quickly and turns back: KhBTZ showed a new modernization of the Soviet T-64 tank
Updated and competitive on the battlefield. A modification of the T-64 tank was demonstrated in Kharkiv. It was retrofitted with additional security systems and the latest communication systems. It will be more comfortable for the crew to work, it even has rear-view cameras. All modifications were made to the order of the tankers themselves. Now the tanks are undergoing state tests. After that, the modification will be put into serial production.

"They knew when to strike": the Russian occupiers shelled Orikhov with mortars. The reaction of the OOS fighters
Instead of a full-scale offensive - mortar attacks. Militant groups became active in Luhansk region. In particular, the Russian occupying forces targeted the outskirts of Stanytsia Luhanska with 82 mm caliber. On the defenders of Orykhovo - 120-millimeter. Mortars were fired here for the first time in the last three months.

translated_title: Leaders of "L/DNR" ask Putin to recognize the independence of their "republics"
translated_text:
The leaders of the separatists "DPR" and "LPR" Denis Pushylin and Leonid Pasichnik called on the President of Russia Vladimir Putin to recognize the independence of the pseudo-republics.
As reported by Ukrinform, it is reported
Interfax
with reference to the statements of Pushylin and Pasichnyk.
It is noted that they both asked the Russian leadership to consider the possibility of concluding friendship and cooperation agreements with their regions, including cooperation in the defense sphere.
Putin on Monday
stated
, who convened an extraordinary meeting of the Security Council of the Russian Federation to discuss the situation in Donbas.
Earlier on Monday, Putin's press secretary Dmytro Peskov told reporters that the president would hold an extraordinary meeting of the Security Council, but refused to reveal the topic of the meeting.
As reported, the State Duma of the Russian Federation previously voted to send an appeal to Putin with a request to recognize the so-called "L/DNR". The Kremlin said that the recognition of these illegal formations does not correlate with the Minsk agreements.
U
Ministry of Foreign Affairs
Ukraine stated that Moscow will bear full responsibility for the destruction of the Minsk agreements and the process of peaceful settlement of the armed conflict in the east of Ukraine in case of recognition of these illegal entities.
From February 17-18, the situation in the east of Ukraine began to worsen. On Friday, the leadership of the ORDLO puppet "republics" announced the start of the evacuation of women, children, and the elderly, primarily from the settlements along the demarcation line due to the alleged offensive of the Armed Forces. On Saturday, a general mobilization of men was announced in the "LNR" and "DNR".
Read also:
Putin's recognition of "L/DPR" would mean Russia's complete rejection of "Minsk" - Blinken
For his part, the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine Valery Zaluzhny addressed the residents of the occupied regions of Donetsk and Luhansk regions, emphasizing that Ukraine is not conducting any offensive operations in the east of Ukraine, and urged not to believe the lies of the occupiers.

translated_title: ‚Äã"What did Russia do badly to Ukraine?" - Chairman of the Federation Council of the Russian Federation Matvienko - news portal LB.ua
translated_text:
Main
‚Äî
The world
‚Äî
February 21, 2022, 5:34 p.m
‚Äã"What did Russia do badly to Ukraine?" - Chairman of the Federation Council of the Russian Federation Matvienko
The politician called on Putin to recognize the "DPR" and "LPR".
Vera Kasiyan
, news editor
Facebook
Twitter
LB.ua in Google News
Photo: video screenshot
Chairman of the Federation Council of Russia
Valentina Matvienko
called on Putin to recognize the fighters of the "DPR" and "LPR". The Russian politician, who was born in Shepetivka, Khmelnytskyi, but supported the occupation of Crimea by the Russian Federation in 2014, said that the time had come for this.
She called the situation in Ukraine during the last seven years a "humanitarian catastrophe", "real genocide, shelling, unemployment, blockade, non-payment of pensions and benefits.
All this time, Russia "consistently at all levels" advocated a political and diplomatic "resolution of the internal Ukrainian conflict." But no one heard her, there was an imitation of the implementation of the Minsk agreements.
She called the TCG meetings "meaningless and useless". It became clear to the Russian Federation that "Kyiv's puppet regime not only cannot, but also does not want to solve anything."
She expressed her reluctance to end the conflict in Ukraine to the United States.
"Ukraine needs this conflict in order to somehow justify the deteriorating economic and social situation, blaming everything on the alleged war. The West needs this conflict as an anti-Russian project, where Ukraine is simply a bargaining chip, not thinking about its national interests, but how to please its masters. That is why the Minsk agreements are not being implemented."
She believes that the demands of the separatists were completely legal and understandable, because they wanted economic autonomy, because they were "tired of feeding Kyiv" and the right to "speak in their native Russian language."
"You see, for Ukraine, Donbass is a territory, and for Russia, for us, it is citizens, people," Matviyenko said.
"Well, how much more can we persuade? How much more can we explain? In the end, a decision must be made. We had enough arguments to force Ukraine to follow a peaceful diplomatic path. It is obvious that this is not part of their plans, they do not want to do this and will not do it," the head of the Federation Council emphasized.
She called the Ukrainians who will come to power in the Donbass, Banderites, and the weapons that the West supplied to Ukraine will fall into their hands.
"For thirty years of existence as separate states, what has Russia done badly to Ukraine?" - Matvienko emotionally addressed Putin.
The Russian Federation allegedly did not interfere in the elections, "supplied gas almost for free" to Ukraine, etc. And the Russian Federation had to intervene by occupying Crimea and part of Donbas, through the "echelons of the Bandera people" who were moving to the east.
Vera Kasiyan
, news editor

translated_title: The Kharkiv region announced its readiness to accept people from the temporarily occupied territories - Kharkiv
translated_text:
The Kharkiv region announced its readiness to accept people from the temporarily occupied territories
February 21, 2022,
13:46
Read the news in Russian
Kharkiv Oblast is ready to accept immigrants / Kharkiv Regional State Administration
Kharkiv region is ready to accept residents from temporarily occupied territories. Oleg Sinegubov made a corresponding statement.
The head of the Kharkiv Regional State Administration announced this at a staff meeting on February 21. He noted that such an option was considered on Saturday, February 19.
To the topic
Synegubov, a former SBU employee, was appointed first deputy head of the Kharkiv Regional State Administration
A place for immigrants
According to Oleg Sinegubov, the possibility of accepting displaced persons from the territories of the temporarily occupied Donetsk and Luhansk regions was discussed with the first deputy head of the regional state administration Oleksandr Skakun.
You know the conditions we live in all the time. There are constant media provocations from the aggressor country regarding a possible invasion of the territory of Ukraine,
‚Äì
Sinegubov said.
He added that plans for the settlement of people are being developed together with the Kharkiv City Hall. However, he did not specify which settlements or places he was talking about.
"We are ready to receive our people. Please, if necessary."
‚Äì
Sinegubov added.
The head of the regional state administration noted that special services and other structures are on alert in the city and region. They are mobilized and can respond to any scenario.
Hardware meeting on February 21 in the Kharkiv Regional State Administration: watch the video
The situation in Lviv
A similar statement was made on February 14 in Lviv. Representatives of the city's clergy talked with the authorities about
reception of immigrants
in the event of a full-scale Russian invasion.
Meeting of authorities and clergy of Lviv / Photo by LMR, Iryna Seredy
Clergymen of Lviv were also invited to training in pre-medical care. Mentors of believers also call constant prayers an effective weapon.
Pay attention!
The armed forces of Ukraine are ready to resist the Kremlin's aggression and defend our land. International partners support the sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine, and are ready to introduce new and strengthened sanctions against Russia.

translated_title: The Kremlin "burned out" on another fake | News on Gazeta.ua
translated_text:
Politics
Monday, February 21, 2022
17:02
Politics
The Kremlin "burned out" on another fake - the "online" of Putin's Security Council took place 5 hours ago
Comment
The meeting of the Security Council of the Russian Federation, which was held by the president of the aggressor country
Vladimir Putin
and which is broadcast "online" by the Russian mass media, took place five hours ago.
This is evidenced by the watches on the hands of the Russian Minister of Defense
Sergei Shoigu
.
The clock time - 12:47 - got into the frame. Screenshot
published
"Observer".
The official online broadcast of the meeting began around 5:00 p.m. Moscow time, around 4:00 p.m. Kyiv time.
READ ALSO:
In Russia, they "destroyed" a fictional sabotage and intelligence group from Ukraine
A political scientist also pointed out that the online service of the Russian Security Council turned out to be a fake
Mykhailo Basarab
.
"Pay attention to the man in a blue uniform on the left. This is the Prosecutor General of Russia Krasnov. At the beginning of the video, he is sitting. Naryshkin is invited to speak, he goes to speak, and this man in a blue uniform, who was just sitting, is already returning after the speech," - writes the political scientist.
Putin called the purpose of the meeting "to determine the steps regarding Donbas" and declared that Ukraine
is preparing a "punitive operation"
.
The Kremlin sent it to all heads of news agencies and TV channels of the Russian Federation
"dark people" - spread disinformation
about "Ukraine's attack on Donbas".

translated_title: Representatives of the security forces were heard at the NSDC, the meeting was not closed - LB.ua news portal
translated_text:
Main
‚Äî
Politics
‚Äî
February 22, 2022, 00:19
Representatives of the national security and defense sector were heard at the National Security Council, the meeting was not closed
"All members of the National Security Council are at their workplaces."
Ivan Music
, News Editor
Facebook
Twitter
LB.ua in Google News
Photo: facebook.com/rnbou
During the meeting
National Security and Defense Councils
speeches were given by representatives of the security forces. So far, the meeting of the National Security Council has not yet been officially closed.
This was announced by the Secretary of the National Security Council
Oleksiy Danilov
.
"The meeting of the National Security Council is not closed, it is ongoing, the President of Ukraine will convene all members of the National Security Council if necessary. We did not close the meeting of the National Security Council. At the meeting of the National Security Council, the national security and defense sectors were heard about the state of affairs taking place on our borders," Danilov said during the briefing.
According to him, the NSDC listened to the report of Prosecutor General Iryna Venediktova, and there were speeches by individual members of the NSDC.
"The next meeting of the National Security Council will be held in the near future if necessary, all members of the National Security Council are at their workplaces," Danilov noted.
According to him, the head of state should speak soon and talk about the reaction of the Ukrainian authorities to Putin's decision.
Danilov also emphasized that Ukraine will fulfill all its obligations to the residents of the occupied regions of Donbas.
He noted that Ukraine does not officially recognize the "independence" of the territories occupied by Russia.
"We clearly understand that the territory of our country is Crimea and all regions that are included in our territory in our Constitution. We act in accordance with our Constitution and the laws that exist in our territory," Danilov said.
Earlier today, the President of the Russian Federation
Vladimir Putin
announced the recognition of "independence"
illegitimate formations "DPR" and "LPR", which are temporarily occupied parts of Donetsk and Luhansk regions. He asked the Federal Assembly to ratify it.
Ivan Music
, News Editor

translated_text:
16:51
21.02.2022
Putin convened the Security Council of the Russian Federation to discuss the situation in Donbas and appeals for the recognition of the "DPR" and "LPR"
1 min to read
The participants of an unscheduled meeting of the Security Council of the Russian Federation under the leadership of the head of state on Monday should determine the next steps regarding the recognition of the independence of the DPR and the LPR, Russian President Vladimir Putin said.
"Today's Kyiv authorities are not going to implement it (the Minsk complex of measures - IF). Moreover, they have already publicly stated this many times - both at the highest state level, and at the level of the Minister of Foreign Affairs, the Security Council," Putin said at the beginning of the meeting of the Security Council of the Russian Federation.
"The purpose of our meeting today is to listen to our colleagues and determine our next steps in this direction, bearing in mind the appeal of the leaders of the "Donetsk People's Republic" and the "Luhansk People's Republic" to Russia with a request to recognize their sovereignty, and the resolution of the State Duma of the Russian Federation on the same topic with a call to the head of state to do so and recognize the independence and sovereignty of the "DPR" and "LPR", Putin said.
According to him, "these issues are very closely related to the global problems of guaranteeing the security of the world in general and on the European continent in particular."

Mariupol is Ukraine: people started gathering for a rally at night
February 22, 2022,
00:52
Read the news in Russian
A rally in support of Ukraine was held in Mariupol / Telegram channel "Dom"
Ukrainians, as we should, decided to unite against the background of Vladimir Putin signing the scandalous decree on the independence of pseudo-republics. People gathered for a rally in front-line Mariupol.
Source:
telegram channel "Dom"
People came out despite the night and the cold. In their hands they hold a blue-yellow flag and placards.
It is important
The National Security Council gathered for an urgent meeting: online broadcast of the briefing
As of 00:00 on February 22, there were not many people - a little more than 10. However, it is not excluded that more activists will join them. On the posters, Ukrainians placed a laconic and simple message: "Mariupol is Ukraine."
Pay attention!
Mariupol is the largest front-line city. It was under the control of hybrid collaborators for several weeks, but the war did not go far and is always breathing down his neck.
Ukrainians came out to support Ukraine in Mariupol / Photo Telegram channel "Dom"
What is known about Putin's scandalous decree
On the evening of February 21, Vladimir Putin signed a decree recognizing the occupied regions of Donbas as independent. In this way, he grossly violated international law and the territorial integrity of Ukraine. Such a move caused the indignation of the international community.
Many EU countries have declared their intention to immediately introduce the toughest sanctions against Russia. Volodymyr Zelenskyi initiated an extraordinary meeting of the National Security Council, and the National Security Council itself switched to 24-hour work mode.

translated_title: Leaders of "L/DNR" ask the Russian President to recognize their independence Den newspaper
translated_text:
February 21, 2022 - 16:42
Tweet
Reuters photo
On February 21, the leaders of the self-proclaimed "Donetsk and Luhansk People's Republics" Denys Pushylin and Leonid Pasechnik simultaneously appealed to Russian President Vladimir Putin to recognize the "L/DNR".
This is stated in the video messages of Pushylin and Pasechnik, published on the air of the TV channel "Russia-24", writes
Public
.
The leaders of the so-called "L/DPR" also appealed to Putin to conclude agreements on cooperation with Russia in the field of defense, as well as to provide financial assistance.
On February 15, the State Duma of Russia voted to appeal to Vladimir Putin about the need to recognize the self-proclaimed "DPR" and "LPR". According to the procedure, within 30 days, the President of Russia can respond favorably to the appeal and sign a decree on recognition.
Ukraine and the West said that Russia's recognition of "L/DPR" means its withdrawal from the Minsk agreements. Russian President Vladimir Putin himself previously stated that it is within the framework of these agreements that the conflict in Donbas should be resolved.

translated_title: World news: Putin announced that he recognized the LPR and the DPR
translated_text:
Russian President Volodymyr Putin announced the recognition of the independence of the "L/DPR" puppet entities.
Putin informed about the signing of the decree in
emergency video appeal
to its citizens, -
transmits
Public.
He made an almost 30-minute excursion into history, reminding once again that "modern Ukraine was completely created by Russia due to the rejection of part of its historical territories, no one asked the residents anything."
"Ukraine even today can be called "Ukraine named after Volodymyr Ilyich Lenin" with full reason. He is its author and architect," Putin said.
At the same time, he added that Ukraine is not just a neighboring country for Russia, but "a part of history, our friends, relatives and loved ones." Putin also stated that Khrushchev gave Crimea as a gift to Ukraine.
"Why was it necessary then to make such generous gifts, which the nationalists did not even dream of?" Putin emphasized.
He mentioned the collapse of the USSR and explained that "a series of mistakes by the top leadership in economic and national policy led to the collapse of our unified state." The head of the Kremlin once again criticized the Revolution of Dignity, repeated the propaganda narrative that "Maidan did not bring Ukraine closer to democracy and progress."
Putin is convinced that "Ukraine's new military strategy is nothing more than preparation for hostilities against Russia."
"In March 2021, Ukraine adopted a new military strategy. This document is actually entirely dedicated to the confrontation with Russia. The goal is to involve foreign countries in the conflict with our country. The strategy provides for the organization of a terrorist underground in the Russian Crimea and the territory of the Donbass. It also outlines the contours of the intended war, and it must end, I quote, "with the assistance of the international community on favorable terms for Ukraine," Putin said.
He noted that President Zelenskyy recently announced Ukraine's possible rejection of nuclear-free status: "It will be much easier for Ukraine to acquire tactical nuclear weapons, especially with technological support from abroad. With the appearance of weapons of mass destruction in Ukraine, the security situation in the world and for Russia will fundamentally change, we cannot fail to respond to these threats."
According to Putin, Ukraine's accession to NATO and deployment of weapons on its territory is a settled issue, and the main goal of the West is to restrain the development of Russia.
"Ukraine's accession to NATO is a direct threat to Russia's security. This is a knife to the throat: ballistic missiles can fly from Kharkiv to Moscow in 7-8 minutes. Ukraine, the USA, and NATO completely ignored Russia's requests, protests, and warnings. They were spat on. I assume that they will behave in the same way, according to the well-known saying "the dog barks, and the caravan moves," Putin is convinced.
In this regard, the Russian president emphasized, "Russia has every right to take appropriate measures." After that, he announced the recognition of the independence of the "LDNR".

translated_title: They did not attack, Kuleba called on Russia to stop the factory of fakes - 24 Kanal
translated_text:
They did not attack - Kuleba called on Russia to stop the factory of fakes
February 21, 2022,
16:33
Read the news in Russian
Kuleba called on Russia to stop the factory of fakes / Photo by Valentina Polishchuk for Channel 24
On February 21, Russia made another absurd statement. He said that the Ukrainian military crossed the border on BMP. Dmytro Kuleba denied this information.
Source:
Dmytro Kuleba's twitter
Details from Kuleba
The Minister of Foreign Affairs emphasized that Ukraine did not attack Donetsk and Luhansk. In addition, our state does not plan any such actions.
To the topic
A person with a disability was found: the occupiers were exposed on a fake video with a "wounded civilian"
I categorically deny Russia's disinformation. Ukraine did not send saboteurs or armored personnel carriers across the border, did not fire on the territory of Russia or checkpoints on the border, did not commit sabotage,
- assured the government official.
The head of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs called on Russia to immediately stop the factory of fakes.
What preceded it
The Ministry of Defense of Russia stated that
5 "Ukrainian saboteurs" crossed the border.
According to them, 2 "Ukrainian BMPs" left for them. Note that in the Kremlin's imagination, 5 soldiers could attack the 150,000-strong army concentrated near our border.
The Russians allegedly "destroyed" the equipment and soldiers. However, it seems that the 150,000 army men were afraid of several "military armed forces" because they asked for reinforcements.
In addition, the Russians spread a fake that Ukrainian fighters
"fired on a border post" in the Rostov region.
Note that this "point" is more like a barn. After all, the video from the scene shows a destroyed small building, which is located in the middle of bushes and trees. Nearby is another building with a roof and a Russian flag and sticks.
This may interest you - Biden reacted to Russia's fakes about shelling in Donbas: video
The full text of Dmitry Kuleba's tweet:
I categorically deny Russia's disinformation. Ukraine: Did not attack Donetsk, Luhansk. Did not send saboteurs or armored personnel carriers across the border. Did not fire on Russian territory or checkpoints on the border. I demand that Russia immediately stop the factory of fakes.

translated_text:
4,000 "evacuees" from the occupied Donbas are asking Russia for the promised money
February 21, 2022,
16:25
4,000 "evacuees" are asking Russia for promised money / Photo by TASS
Russia claims to have already accepted more than 60,000 residents of the occupied part of Donbas. Approximately 4,000 of them applied to pay the money promised to them.
Source:
TASS
The aggressor state continues to "evacuate" people living in the temporarily occupied areas of Donetsk and Luhansk regions.
Read also
In Russia, people are forcibly evicted from hospitals for the sake of "evacuees" from Donbas
In Moscow, they say that they "evacuated" 61,000 people
According to the results of the work overnight (as of February 21 - Channel 24), the number of Donbas residents who arrived in Russia increased to 61,000.
- announced in Moscow.
The head of the Ministry of Emergency Situations Oleksandr Chupriyan reported that 9 trains with people from the occupied Donbas were sent from the Rostov region to other regions of Russia within a day.
People ask for promised money
Russia also claims that "payments in the amount of 10,000 rubles were received by more than 1,000 evacuees."
"We have an increasing number of payments and documents that are prepared for these payments. We
received approximately 4 thousand applications
", the aggressor state informed.
Recall that
On February 18, Russian mercenaries
announced the "evacuation" of the population of the occupied part of Donbas
to Russia
"Evacuation" of residents of the occupied territories to Russia: in brief
The aggressor state spread a fake that people were allegedly threatened by the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Although residential areas are shelled by Russian militants.
Vladimir Putin promised
10,000 rubles to all "refugees".
At first, people were left to their own devices.
They sat in cold buses all night
in the village of Chryveny Desant, Nekliniv district, without food, water and a normal toilet.
Later, some of the "evacuees" were placed in a gym, and others in cramped tents of the Russian Ministry of Emergency Situations. People did not see the promised resorts and sanatoriums.
In the Rostov region, part of local residents
hostilely received the news about people
from the territories occupied by Russia.

Don't play with the lives of people in Donbas, Berbok addressed Putin
February 21, 2022,
13:13
Read the news in Russian
Berbok appealed to Putin / press service of the German "Greens" party
Annalena Berbok sharply condemned Russia's aggression against Ukraine. The German diplomat urged Putin to sit down at the negotiating table.
Source:
Zeit
The Minister of Foreign Affairs of Germany noted that the actions of the Russian authorities now are "absolutely irresponsible play". She announced this during the meeting of the heads of foreign affairs of the EU member states in Brussels.
Read also

Annalena Burbok emphasized that the lives of a huge number of people in Donbas are now under great threat, there are risks of problems with electricity and water supply in the front-line areas in the east of Ukraine.

translated_title: EU High Representative Borrell: Putin's recognition of the "DPR" and "LPR" is a violation of the territorial integrity of Ukraine and the Minsk agreements
translated_text:
22:10
21.02.2022
EU High Representative Borrell: Putin's recognition of the "DPR" and "LPR" is a violation of the territorial integrity of Ukraine and the Minsk agreements
1 min to read
The High Representative of the European Union for Foreign and Security Policy, Josep Borrell, said that the recognition of the so-called "LDNR" by the President of Russia, Vladimir Putin, is a violation of the territorial integrity of Ukraine and the Minsk agreements.
"The recognition of two separatist territories in Ukraine is a flagrant violation of international law, the territorial integrity of Ukraine and the Minsk agreements. The EU and its partners will respond with unity, firmness and determination as a sign of solidarity with Ukraine," Borrell wrote on Twitter on Monday.
Previously, the presidents of the European Council, Charles Michel, and the European Commission, Ursula von der Leyen, made a practically similar record.
As reported, Russian President Vladimir Putin signed a decree recognizing the independence of the so-called "Luhansk People's Republic" and "Donetsk People's Republic" at a ceremony in the Kremlin.

translated_text:
Macron and Putin agreed to try to achieve a ceasefire in eastern Ukraine
05:05 | 21.02.2022 /
News
/
war in the east
,
macron
,
negotiations
,
Putin
/
Views
0

There are no comments
French and Russian Presidents Emmanuel Macron and Vladimir Putin have agreed to try to achieve a ceasefire in eastern Ukraine.
This was announced by the Elysee Palace on February 20 after a long telephone conversation between the heads of the two states.
writes
"European truth".
The leaders of the two countries agreed on "the need to promote a diplomatic solution to the current crisis and to do everything to achieve it," the Elysee Palace said.
They agreed that intensive work is needed to hold a tripartite contact group meeting in the coming hours to obtain commitments from all sides on a ceasefire along the contact line.
They also agreed on the need to resume work within the Normandy format based on the exchanges and proposals made by Ukraine in recent days.
Minister of Foreign Affairs
Jean-Yves Le Drian
and
Sergey Lavrov
should hold a meeting in the coming days. In addition, diplomatic work should soon lead to a possible meeting at the highest level with the participation of Ukraine, Russia and allies to establish a new security order in Europe.
"To carry out this work under serious conditions, the heads of state of the two states have made a firm commitment to take all useful actions to avoid escalation, reduce risks and preserve peace," the Elysee Palace said in a statement.
The Kremlin said that during a telephone conversation with Macron, Putin accused Ukraine of provocations and escalation of the situation in Donbas.
"The President of Russia noted that the reason for the escalation is provocations by the Ukrainian security forces," the Kremlin said in a statement after the conversation, which lasted 1 hour and 45 minutes.
The Kremlin also noted that Putin told Macron that NATO countries continue to "pump Ukraine with modern weapons," which "pushes Kyiv to a military solution to the so-called Donbas problem."
Putin also demanded that NATO and Washington "take seriously" Russia's demands for security guarantees.

translated_title: In the Russian Federation, they are talking about recognizing the independence of the "L/DPR" within the Luhansk and Donetsk regions
translated_text:
18:41
21.02.2022
In the Russian Federation, they are talking about recognizing the independence of the "L/DPR" within the Luhansk and Donetsk regions
1 min to read
The head of the Ministry of Internal Affairs of Russia, Volodymyr Kolokoltsev, stated at a meeting of the Security Council of the Russian Federation about the need to recognize the independence of the so-called L/DPR within the Luhansk and Donetsk regions of Ukraine.
"It is unequivocally necessary to recognize these republics and their legal personality, but I would like to make an amendment - to recognize within the administrative boundaries in which these republics and the peoples of these republics were located before the occupation by the Armed Forces of Ukraine, precisely from Mariupol and ending with those historical borders," he said on Monday at a meeting of the Security Council of the Russian Federation.
This was announced by Vyacheslav Nikonov, the first deputy chairman of the Russian State Duma Committee on International Affairs. "This is actually a very interesting question. It is clear that it is not within the boundaries in which the LPR and the DPR currently exist, taking into account the occupation of a large part of the Donetsk and Luhansk regions by Ukrainian troops. There may indeed be an administrative border option," Nikonov said on the air of the Rossiya-24 TV channel (VDTRK).
Nikonov also believes that the President of Russia will make a decision on the recognition of "L/DNR", then Moscow can conclude a complex of interstate agreements with Luhansk and Donetsk, which will also include military issues.
"I am sure that it will be a treaty on friendship and cooperation, on a comprehensive partnership, agreements on economic interaction, on the use of the ruble, probably on the territory of the "L/DPR" and, of course, there will be, especially in the current situation, military articles," he said.
